items.content_html: A lightweight Chrome extension that lets you archive the current browser tab into a quarterly-organised bookmark folder in one click or via a keyboard shortcut. It automatically detects or creates your “Archived” root folder, the current `YYYY-Qn` folder (and optional month subfolder), and saves the new bookmark at the top for instant access.
items.title: timhc22/chrome-tab-archiver: A lightweight Chrome extension that lets you archive the current browser tab into a quarterly-organised bookmark folder in one click or via a keyboard shortcut. It automatically detects or creates your “Archived” root folder, the current `YYYY-Qn` folder (and optional month subfolder), and saves the new bookmark at the top for instant access.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: RideCompare.AI is a lightweight, AI-assisted web tool that compares real-time ride fares and ETAs across Ola, Uber, and Rapido based on your journey route. Designed for urban commuters, it helps users make smarter, faster, and cheaper ride decisions—powered by real-time data, machine learning
